trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 將其他型別的執行個體來回轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The following sample uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DConverter> structure to convert a string into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D> structure.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DConverter>結構轉換成字串<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D>結構。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DConverter" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3DConverter" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 正在評估以進行轉換之來源的型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a class can be converted from a given type to an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 判斷類別是否可從指定型別轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the type can be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 表示型別是否可以轉換成 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 意義

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> false
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> false

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The converter cannot convert from the provided type.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 轉換器無法從提供的類型進行轉換。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> true
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> true

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The converter can convert the provided type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 轉換器可以將提供的類型轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The desired type that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure is being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: 要評估這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構是否可以轉換到的型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure can be converted to a different type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構的執行個體是否可以轉換為不同型別。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure can be converted to <paramref name="destinationType" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構是否可以轉換為 <paramref name="destinationType" />。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 意義

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> false
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> false

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The converter cannot convert this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 轉換器無法將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構轉換為指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> true
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> true

trans-unit.source: </term><description> The converter can convert this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 轉換器可以將這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構轉換為指定的類型。

trans-unit.source: The ITypeDescriptorContext for this call.
trans-unit.target: 這個呼叫的 ITypeDescriptorContext。

trans-unit.source: Describes the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> of the type being converted.
trans-unit.target: 描述正要轉換之型別的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The object being converted.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的物件。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將指定的物件轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure created from the converted <paramref name="value" />.
trans-unit.target: 從已轉換之 <paramref name="value" /> 建立的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: Occurs if the specified object is **null** or is a type that cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的物件為 **null** 或屬於無法轉換為 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構的類型，便會發生這種情況。

trans-unit.source: Describes the context information of a type.
trans-unit.target: 描述類型的內容資訊。

trans-unit.source: The CultureInfo which is respected when converting.
trans-unit.target: 轉換時遵守的 CultureInfo。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The type this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure is converted to.
trans-unit.target: 這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構轉換為的型別。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure to a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構轉換為指定的型別。

trans-unit.source: The object created from converting this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: 從轉換這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 結構建立的物件。
